Time_Crawl.display_help: You're able to dramatically slow the time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed. Recharge: Long.
Time_Crawl.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced

messages.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the attack rate, movement speed, regeneration rate of the target.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} slows you down to a crawl with their {PowerName}, reducing your movement speed, attack speed and regeneration speed.

Temporal_Mending.display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
Temporal_Mending.display_short_help: PBAoE, Ally +Heal, Heal Over Time, +Res(Slow, Regen Debuff)

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} health with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} continues to heal you for {Damage} health.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} continually heals you for {Damage} health with their {PowerName}.
{PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} health with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} continues to heal you for {Damage} health.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} continually heals you for {Damage} health with their {PowerName}.

Times_Juncture.display_help: You create a time dilation field around you causing enemies who get too close to be slowed to a crawl, their movement speed, damage and chance to hit will be decreased substantially. Enemies affected by Delayed have these affects increased. Recharge: Slow
Times_Juncture.display_target_help: The flow of time has been dramatically slowed around the foe using Time's Juncture reducing your damage, speed and chance to hit.
Times_Juncture.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the damage, movement speed and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Times_Juncture.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage, speed and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

Temporal_Selection.display_help: You distort time around an ally, selecting a period of time where their abilities are at their highest. Their damage, attack rate and regeneration rates are dramatically increased for a brief period. This power places the Accelerated effect on the target. While this is in effect, the target has any healing and healing over time effects from Temporal Mending or Chrono Shift significantly increased. Recharge: Very Long
Temporal_Selection.display_target_help: Your movements have been sped up as if you're flowing more quickly through time. You gain a significant bonus to your damage, recharge rate and regeneration.
Temporal_Selection.display_attacker_hit: You significantly increase {PlayerDest}'s damage, recharge rate and regeneration for a short time.
Temporal_Selection.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage, Recharge Rate and Regeneration.

Distortion_Field.display_help: You can choose an area to slow the flow of time down to a crawl. Enemies who enter the field will have their attack rate and speed slowed dramatically. In addition, affected enemies might become held as they are frozen in time. Targets affected by Time Crawl will have the chance to be held increased. Recharge: Very Long
Distortion_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe(-Recharge, -Speed), Chance for Hold
Distortion_Field.display_target_help: The Distortion Field has reduced your Recharge and Movement Speed.
Distortion_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces your targets' Movement and Recharge Speed.

Time_Stop.display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time causing them to be held helpless. Even those resistant to the effects of Time Stop's hold will still have their regeneration rate and healing effects reduced for a brief period. Targets affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful hold, however its benefits are brief. Recharge: Long
Time_Stop.display_target_help: You have been held by Time Stop. Your healing effects and regeneration rate have also been reduced.

Farsight.display_help: You give your allies a brief glimpse of the future and what is to come. This provides you and your team a moderate increase to your chance to hit and defense for a short period of time. Recharge: Very Long
Farsight.display_target_help: You have brief glimpses of the future allowing you to predict your foes' movements. Your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit is increased briefly.
Farsight.display_attacker_hit: You grant your allies the ability to briefly glimpse into the future thus increasing their Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit.
Farsight.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit with {PowerName}.

Slowed_Response.display_help: You manipulate time around a targeted foe causing their reflexes to become slowed and sluggish. This causes them to have decreased defense and damage resistance. A target affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful effect. Recharge: Very Long
Slowed_Response.display_target_help: Your defense and resistance has been lowered by Slowed Response.
Slowed_Response.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces the defenses and resistances of your target and nearby foes.
Slowed_Response.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your defense and resistances with their {PowerName}

Chrono_Shift.display_help: You cause nearby allies to act more quickly by allowing them to slip through the time stream seamlessly. When Chrono Shift is activated, you and nearby allies will immediately recover a portion of your health and endurance. Chrono Shift will greatly increase the Recharge Speed of nearby allies for the duration of the power, additionally for a short while the flow of time will constantly undo a portion of your allies' wounds causing them to periodically recover health and recover endurance. An ally affected by Temporal Selection will recover additional health from Chrono Shift. Chrono Shift will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Very Long
Chrono_Shift.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +Recharge, Heal, +End, Moderate Healing over Time, +Recovery
